name: JagranNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Jagran News Flash briefing brings the Latest & Breaking News Headlines from India & around the World. Hear Top News stories on topics from Politics, Sports, Business, Bollywood & Entertainment.

After enabling this skill, you can say things like “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing. Go to the settings page on your Alexa app, and find “Flash Briefing” to move Jagran News to the top of your Flash Briefing queue.”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
